channel.title: VersityX 317 PI Recruiting Team (Requesting Host 24/7)

If you can add any of them, Apply thanks! ___________________________________________________________________ [size=18pt]About Us:[/size] We need coders. Apply Now What I will we need from the coder is for them to be able to code a Client, Cache, Source. We are using a PI base. ____________________________________________________________________ [size=18pt]Official Members:[/size] Owner: Saige Co-Owner: Lust Developer: Cliche Developer: N/A GFX: N/A GFX: N/A ____________________________________________________________________ [size=18pt]Team Thread:[/size] Application: Name: Age: MSN/SKYPE: What Postion: Experience: ____________________________________________________________________ [size=18pt]Contact:[/size] If you want to contact me here is my skype: Booga464 ____________________________________________________________________ [size=18pt]Media:[/size]
